content: 8 skip next 6 sts 7 & chain-5 space ** repeat 4 more times from * to ** join = 6 branches finishing fasten_off & weave in the ends © irarott increase 2016 snowflake 2 14 5 4 to beg chain 7 join to beg chain with a slip_stitch to form 3 9 a ring 2 round 1 chain 2 do not count as double_crochet 18 double_crochet in ring 1 join = 18 sts round 2 beg dc3tog chain 30 single_crochet in 20th chain from 7 hook single_crochet in next 5 chs chain 5 dc3tog in © irarott increase 2016 next 3 sts of round 1 chain 30 single_crochet in 20th chain from hook single_crochet in next 5 chs chain 5 5 times join = 6 branches to beg chain 7 join to beg chain with a slip_stitch to form a ring christmas snowfall - 12 snowflakes | irarott® crochet pattern | copyright 2009-2016 © irarott increase | irarott com 6 egap round 1 chain 2 do not count as double_crochet 18 double_crochet in ring join = 18 sts round 2 chain 1 do not count as a st here & throughout single_crochet in same st as join chain 9 skip 2 sts single_crochet in next st chain 9 skip 2 sts 4 times single_crochet in next st chain 5 skip 2 sts dtr to beg chain 7 join to beg chain with a slip_stitch to form in beg st --> count as last chain-9 arch = 6 a ring arches round 1 chain 1 do not count as a st 12 single_crochet in ring round 3 chain 1 7 single_crochet around post of dtr just made join = 12 sts single_crochet in next st picot 13 single_crochet around next round 2 chain 3 count as beg double_crochet chain 7 slip_stitch in 4th chain-9 arch single_crochet in next st picot 5 times chain from hook chain 3 skip next st double_crochet in 6 single_crochet around next chain-5 space join = 6 next st chain 7 slip_stitch in 4th chain from hook branches with 1 picot between every chain 3 skip st 5 times join with slip_stitch in top branch of beg chain-3 = 6 double_crochet & 6 picots round 4 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as join chain 14 single_crochet in round 3 chain 14 slip_stitch in 4th chain from hook chain 10 7th st after picot 5 times chain 14 join = skip next picot slip_stitch in next double_crochet 6 times = 6 arches 6 branches round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as join picot 8 single_crochet finishing fasten_off & weave in the ends triple picot 8 single_crochet around next arch single_crochet in next st picot 8 single_crochet triple picot 8 single_crochet snowflake 4 around next arch 5 times join = 6 branches finishing fasten_off & weave in the ends snowflake 3 3 8 2 1 7 3 © irarott increase 2016 2 1 7 to beg chain 7 join to beg chain with a slip_stitch
